tooltip-t-wikibase: Dɔregɔ n wan yakɛ "data repository" lɔgerɔ
wikibase-after-page-move: Fu ŋmɛregerɛ nananewa wan dɛna la [$1 reflected in the {{WBREPONAME}} item] Tu some ti fu bisɛ bala san iŋɛ ni.
wikibase-after-page-delete: La nari ni ti ba yese ɔregɔ sɛka n boi pɛgera wa ze'ele la [$1 the associated {{WBREPONAME}} item]. Tumam soke ti fu bisɛ ti dina iŋɛ mɛ.
wikibase-after-page-delete-queued:
[$1 {{WBREPONAME}} item] la n naɛ ba miŋa la pɛgedina la wan pa'asɛ ni buyila. 
N beleni fu mɛ mina ti dina ta'am kan iŋɛ nananewa.
wikibase-comment-remove: "Associated {{WBREPONAME}} lɔgerɔ n yese. Tɔgum dɔtɔ n yese.
wikibase-comment-linked: {{WBREPONAME}} la lɔgerɔ n tɔkɛ la ka pɛgera.
wikibase-comment-unlink: Pɛgedina wa ka tɔkɛ la {{WBREPONAME}} lɔgerɔ la. Tɔgum dɔtɔ n yese.
wikibase-comment-restore: " Associated" {{WBREPONAME}}lɔgerɔ ka yese. Tɔgum lɔgerɔ n lebese.
wikibase-comment-sitelink-change: Tɔgum dɔregɔ n tee ze'ele $1 ta paɛ $2
wikibase-linkitem-alreadylinked: Pɛgedina ti fu bɔta ti fu tɔkɛ la pugum tara la [$1 item] n boi tiŋasuka "data repository" mina n tɔkɛ la [[$2]] n boi zi'an wa puan. Lɔgerɔ ta'am wan tara la pɛgerɛ diyima n boi zi'an woo puan. N beleni mɛ, loe pɛgerɛ dito'ore la fu tɔkɛ.
wikibase-linkitem-close: yu "dialog" la gee le lebese pɛgera
wikibase-linkitem-failure: Tuure n ka tari mina n iŋɛ ni gee tiregeri ni ti ba tɔkɛ pɛgerɛ la.
wikibase-linkitem-failed-modify: Kan ta'am tɔkɛ pɛgera:koŋe ni ti a "merge" lɔgesi'a n ŋwɔni n boi {{WBREPONAME}}.
wikibase-linkitem-selectlink: N beleni fu mɛ ti fu loe zi'an la pɛregerɛ ti fu bɔta ti fu dikɛ ta pɛgedina wa
wikibase-linkitem-confirmitem-text: Pɛgera la ti fu looge ni la pugum naɛ me la [$1 item on our central data repository]. N beleni mɛ pa'alɛ ti {{PLURAL:$2|page|pages}} n boi tiŋanuurɛ {{PLURAL:$2|is|are}} la {{PLURAL:$2|one|ones}} ti fu bɔta ti fu tɔkɛ la pɛgera.
wikibase-linkitem-not-loggedin-title: Fu nari mɛ ti fu lɔɔgɛ kɛ
wikibase-linkitem-not-loggedin: Fu suni mɛ ti fu lɔɔgɛ kɛ "wiki" kuna puan la [$1 central data repository] la puan la fu ta'am dikɛ ka tum.
wikibase-linkitem-success-link: Pɛgera la tɔkɛ ya. Fu wan ta'am nyɛ lɔgerɔ la n tari dɔtɔ la tu [$1 central data repository] la puan.
wikibase-rc-show-wikidata-pref: Pa'alɛ {{WBREPONAME}} demesego n boi nananewa teere la puan
wikibase-rcfilters-hide-wikibase-conflic:
"Filter" kana kɔ'ɔm la nɔkpe'ene paara ayima bii zo'e zo'e tuunɛ la ba'asegɔ bii tuntuna la puti'irɛ "filter" duma.
Suŋa la puti'irɛ yelesum duma ka boi {{WBREPONAME}} demesego duma la puan.

"{{WBREPONAME}} demesego duma "filter" tari la nɔkpe'ene la ayima bii zo'e zo'e tuunɛ la suŋa bii tuntuna puti'irɛ "filter" duma. Suŋa la puti'irɛ yelesum duma la ka boi {{WBREPONAME}} demesego duma la puan. Nɔkpe'ene "filter" duma la n tɔi sɛka n boi zi'an la, saazuo.
wikibase-rcfilters-damaging-conflicts-hi: Tuunɛ suŋa yelesum duma la ka boi teere buuri asi'a puan,bala buna kɔ'ɔm ŋmɛ la teemiŋerɛ taaba la n boi se'em la {{PLURAL:$2|filter|filters}}: $1
wikibase-rcfilters-goodfaith-conflicts-h: Tuntuna puti'irɛ yelesum duma ka boi teere buuri buuri asi'a, bala buna kɔ'ɔm ŋmɛ la teemiŋerɛ taaba la n boi se'em la {{PLURAL:$2|filter|filters}}: $1
wikibase-rcfilters-hide-wikibase-conflic: {{WBREPONAME}} demesego duma la za'a kɔ'ɔm ti'isɛ ti ka de la "pika", bala la"{{WBREPONAME}} demesego duma" "filter" la kɔ'ɔm ŋmɛ la "dagi-pika demesego duma" "filter".
wikibase-rcfilters-major-conflicts-hide-: {{WBREPONAME}} demesego duma za'a kɔ'ɔm ti'isɛ ti ka de la "pika", bala la {{WBREPONAME}} demesego duma kɔ'ɔm ŋmɛ la " dagi-pika " demesego duma" "filter".
wikibase-rcfilters-hide-wikibase-conflic: {{WBREPONAME}} demesego duma la za'a kɔ'ɔm ti'isɛ ti ka de la 'pika", bala la{{WBREPONAME}} demesego duma kɔ'ɔm ŋmɛ la "dagi-pika demesego duma" "filter".
wikibase-replicationnote: N beleni fu mɛ, mina suŋa ti la ta’am yue paa gogo se’em gee teere la nya niɛ wikiduma la za’a puam.
wikibase-watchlist-show-changes-pref: Pa'alɛ {{WBREPONAME}} demesego duma n boi fu "watchlist"
wikibase-error-invalid-entity-id: "ID" Kana "$2", " system " la ka mi ka. N beleni fu mɛ dikɛ yelemiŋerɛ ID.
wikibase-error-exceeded-entity-access-li: {{WBREPONAME}} duma zo'e zo'e yelesi'a n boi zi'an la.
wikibase-error-exceeded-referenced-entit: "mw.wikibase.getReferencedEntityId" duma zo'e zo'e yi'a, ma'a n paɛ $2 {{PLURAL:$2|allowed}}.
unconnectedpages: Pɛgera la ka tɔkɛ la lɔgerɔ la
unconnectedpages-summary: Pɛgedina wa pa'alɛ la pɛgera gee ka le dikɛ 'data' lɔgerɔ (zi'isi zo'e zo'e zo'e zo'e n suŋɛ lɔgerɔ sɛka n boi lɔgerɔ la puan).
pageswithbadges-summary: Pɛgedina wa kaalɛ la pɛga n tari lagesi (magesɛ wuu; gɔŋɔ suŋa bii gã'arɛ gɔŋɔ la). Ba welese yu'ura la dɔla la ze'elego pɛgera ID, bala la pɛgepaalesi la wan yi yia.
entityusage-summary: Pɛgedina wa kaali la pɛesi'a n tari bo'olum lɔgerɔ (magesɛ wuu Q42). Ba dikɛ yu'ura la doose la pɛgera ID, bala la ba ta'asɛ pɛgera paalega ti ba ta'asɛ yia.
wikibase-entityusage-legend: Pɛgera yusi'a n tari yu'ura tuna
wikibase-pageinfo-entity-usage: {{WBREPONAME}} lɔgerɔ n boi pɛgera wa puan
wikibase-pageinfo-entity-usage-O: Yɛla tɔka tɔka n boi zi'an (magesɛ wuu ba yire duma, yelemɛŋerɛ n boi zi'an)
wikibase-otherprojects-beta-description: Pa'asɛ "{{int:wikibase-otherprojects}}" bɔberɛ n paari "sidebar" kaŋa n bo'ori dɔtɔ n wan paɛ "Wikipedia" ayima tuuma asi'a yɛsera {{WBREPONAME}} "data".
echo-pref-tooltip-wikibase-action: Bo ma lasebaarɛ  sansɛka ti nɛra nyɛ pɛgerɛ {{GENDER:|I created}} ta paɛ {{WBREPONAME}} lɔgerɔ.
notification-header-page-connection: Pɛgerɛ la $3 daa de la {{GENDER:$2|connected}} n paari {{PLURAL:$4|-1=a {{WBREPONAME}} item|the {{WBREPONAME}} item $4}}, zi'an ti yelepakerɛ yelezure la wan ta'am lagesɛ.
notification-bundle-header-page-connecti: $3 la {{PLURAL:$4|one other page|$4 other pages|100=99+ other pages}} daa de la {{GENDER:$2|connected}} n paari {{WBREPONAME}} lɔgerɔ, zi'an ti yelepakerɛ yelezure la wan ta'am lagesɛ.
notification-subject-page-connection: Pɛgerɛ n boi {{SITENAME}} fu {{GENDER:$3|created}} daa de la {{GENDER:$2|connected}} pa'asɛ {{WBREPONAME}} lɔgerɔ
unresolved-property-category: Pɛgera n tari sɛla n ka naɛ
unresolved-property-category-desc: Buna kɔ'ɔm pa'alɛ la pɛgera  sɔsega la {{WBREPONAME}} sɛla n ka boi hali la ba lɔgerɔv"ID" bii "label".
connected-redirect-category: Lebese sɛla n tɔkɛ la {{WBREPONAME}} lɔgerɔ
connected-redirect-category-desc: Tige-ana yu'ura lebese pa'ala la pɛgesi'a n tɔkɛ la {{WBREPONAME}} lɔgerɔ.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-permissions-: Fu ka tari yɔ'ɔ ti fu demese lɔge kana, la ŋwana wa puan {{PLURAL:$1|reason|reasons}}:
wikibase-client-data-bridge-protected-on: tɔgum kana boi la nananewa [$1 fully protected] n boi {{WBREPONAME}} gee me wan ta'am demese ama'a n boi [$2 administrators].

beni n sɔi ti lɔgekuna gura?

  • lasebaarɛ asi'a la lɔgerɔ (la ba tuuma n de si'a) kɔ'ɔm dɛna la Sara woo [$1 protected] viisegɔ la zuo. Saŋa kasɛka, ba n gu ba mɛ yɛsera la [$2 editing disputes] Nɛra woo ta'am demese lɔgerɔ la zo'e zo'e.anyone.
  • se'ere n sɔi ti tu gu'ura ta'am nyɛ la [$3 protection log].

What can I do?

  • [$4 Discuss this Item] la basɛba.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-semiprotecte: tɔgum kana nan boi la [$1 semi-protected] n boi{{WBREPONAME}} gee me wan ta'am demese di ma'n n boi [$2 autoconfirmed users].

beni n sɔi ti lɔgekuna gura?

  • gee ti nɛra woo ta'am demese lɔgerɔ la zo'e zo'e, saŋa kasɛka la nari mɛ ti ba bɔ'ɔra "vandalism" n boi lɔgerɔ zo'e zo'e.
  • se'ere n sɔi ti tu gu'ura ta'am nyɛ la [$1 protection log].

Beni ti n wan ta'am iŋɛ?

  • Fu san tara tuntuna "accounts" n boi

    {{WBREPONAME}}, [[Special:UserLogin|log in]] yia.
  • fu san ka tara ayima, [[Special:CreateAccount|create an account]] n boi {{WBREPONAME}}.Fu san kɔ'ɔm nyaŋɛ ba'asɛ fu wan ta'am demese "semi-protected" pɛgera
  • [$2 Discuss this Item] la basɛba.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-cascadeprote: Tɔgum kana kɔ'ɔm dɛna mɛ nananewa gura me la {{WBREPONAME}} gee me wan ta'am demese me la [$2 administrators]. ma'a

Beni n sɔi ti tuunɛ wa gu?

Dina tari tɔgum la kɔ'ɔm dikɛ la bala puan {{PLURAL:$1|page, which is|pages, which are}} gu me la "cascading" "option"

$2
wikibase-client-data-bridge-blocked-on-r: Fu tuntuna yu'urɛ bii "IP address" la gu mɛ la {{WBREPONAME}}.

"block" la iŋɛ mɛ la $1. Di vuurɛ de la $2.

  • "block " pɔsega: $8
  • "block "saŋa wan ba'asɛ: $6

Beni ti n wan ta'am iŋɛ?

Fu ta'am nyɛ $4 bii ayima [$9 administrator] ti ya sɔsɛ " block " la yele. fu ta'am dikɛ la tum "{{int:emailuser}}" aŋa yelemɛŋerɛ "email" "address" san dɛna yelemɛŋerɛ n boi fu [[Special:Preferences|preferences]] gee ti ba ka gu fu ka tuuma puan. Ba n gu fu "ID" la de la #$5 N beleni fu mɛ pa'asɛ yelesi'a n boi zuen fu san iŋɛ sogesego asi'a.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-cascadeprote: pɛgedina wa nan kɔ'ɔm [[Project:Cascade|cascade protected]] n boi "wiki" kuna puan gee me ta'am wan demese di ma'a la [[Project:Administrators|administrators]].

Beni ti lɔgekuna gu?

Pɛgekuna wa de [[Project:Transclusion|transcluded]] iŋa puan {{PLURAL:$1|page, which is|pages, which are}} gu me la "[[Project:Cascade|cascading]]" "option":

$2
wikibase-client-data-bridge-blocked-on-c: Fu tuntuna yu'urɛ bii "IP address" la "blocked" mɛ n boi "wiki" kuna puan.

Ba iŋɛ "block" la mɛ la $1. Ba bo di vuurɛ la mɛ ti $2.

  • "block" pɔsega: $8
  • "Block " saŋa wan ba'asɛ: $6

Beni ti n wan iŋɛ?

Fu ta'am nyɛ $4 bii ayima [[{{int:grouppage-sysop}}|administrator]] ti ya sɔsɛ "block" la yele. Fu ta'am dikɛ la tum "{{int:emailuser}}" aŋa la dɛna yelemɛŋerɛ "email address" dɛna yelemɛŋerɛ n boi fu [[Special:Preferences|preferences]] gee ti ba me ka gu fu ti fu tara ka tuna. "Block" la "ID" de la #$5. N beleni fu mɛ pa'alɛ yɛla woo ti fu dikɛ sokere duma la puan n boi zuen la.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-permissions-: Fu kan ta'am demese lɔgekuna wa yɛsera la vuurɛ n ka mi
wikibase-client-data-bridge-edit-decisio: N beleni fu mɛ loe demesego buuri sɛka ti fu demese la:

<strong>Mam n malum demese
<strong>lɔkɔ n ka doose suŋa
Pooren lɔgerɔ la ka de ni ma'a gee me kelum ka dɛna.
Pooren lɔgerɔ la n  daa ni dɛna la ma'a dee nananewa saŋa mɛ.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-anonymous-ed: Warning: Fu ka "logged" kɛ. Fu "IO address" wan niɛ ti nɛra woo nyɛta fu san iŋɛ demesego sɛka. Fu san "log" kɛ bii maalɛ "account", fu demesego duma la lagesɛ fu tuntuna yu'urɛ, la nyɔɔrɔ sɛba n boi bini.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-license-body:
Fu san tɛɛra lɔgekuna wa la me wan le tari teere wa'am wa bo {{WBREPONAME}} gee me wan ta'am iŋɛ n boi wiki n boi dɔgum busebo puan.

Fu san di'e "{{int:$1}}", fu sakɛ bo la [$2 terms of use],gee fu ka sakɛ ti fu basɛ fu bo'olum la [$3 $4].
wikibase-client-data-bridge-bailout-head: Fu ta'am iŋɛ sɛba n boi wa:
wikibase-client-data-bridge-bailout-sugg: Demese lɔkɔ wa n boi {{WBREPONAME}}. Di'e "button" wa n boi tiŋanuurɛ wa demese lɔgerɔ la tuntɔɔ (dɔregɔ n yu'ɔ "tab" pa'alɛ).

Yele la nuurɛ la n wan iŋɛ se'em la, la ta'am wan tugum dɛna ti tu tɔgum gulese ya la n tari zi'an woo [$1 the article editor]. La za'a san wan ta'am iŋɛ,tumam ka'am ti fu pa'asɛ lɔgerɔ la pa'asɛ {{WBREPONAME}} dɔla "button" la n boi zuen la.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-unsupported-: Fum n demeseri lɔkɔ la n de $1 la ka le  suŋera nananewa
$1 de la "data type" $2 n boi {{WBREPONAME}}. Fun n demeseri "data type" ka suŋeri nananewa.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-deprecated-s: Fum n demeseri lɔkɔ n de $1 nan ka suŋeri nananewa
Lɔkɔ n de $1 de la , deŋe ni n boi {{WBREPONAME}}. Fum n demeseri deŋe ni lɔkɔ nan kɔ'ɔm ka suŋera nananewa.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-ambiguous-st: Fum n demeseri lɔgerɔ zo'e zo'e nan ka suŋeri nananewa
Nananewa $1 can ta'am demese se'ere n sɔi la ku tari la la lɔgerɔ n zo'e gana lɔgeyiŋɔ.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-somevalue-er: Fum n demeseri lɔkɔ n de $1 nan kɔ'ɔm ka suŋera nananewa
$1 zuni me la fum n tari lɔkɔ ti fu ka mina n boi {{WBREPONAME}}. Fum n demeseri lɔkɔ zuni me la lɔkɔ ti fu ka mina kan ta'am iŋɛ nananewa.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-novalue-erro: Fum n demeseri lɔkɔ n de $1 kan ta'am suŋɛ nananewa
$1 de la no value n boi {{WBREPONAME}}. Demesera lɔgerɔ de mɛ bii ka boi lɔgerɔ Nananewa kan ta'am iŋɛ.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-saving-error: La ka ta'am biŋe teere la
Fu teere la kan nyaŋɛ biŋe yɛsera la tuure n boi bini. N beleni fu mɛ le tiregɛ biŋe le yɛ'ɛsa.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-edit-conflic: Tuntuna ayima n nan kɔ'ɔm demese lɔgetuna wa gee "published" ba teere la yia. Fu teere la ka nyaŋɛ tum. N beleni fu mɛ lebese pɛgera la gee nyaŋɛ to'e tɔmpaalɛ la.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-unknown-erro: Sɛla n daa ka kiŋɛ suŋa
Tuure n iŋɛ gee ti tuumsi'a ti tu loose la ka ta'am demese nananewa. N beleni fu mɛ le tiregɛ bisɛ.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-error-report:
tuure la san kelum bɔna, n beleni fu mɛ [$1 report this issue] pa'ali fu itegɔ la gee dikɛ la pa'alɛ fu itegɔ la

  • $2
  • $3 n de $4
  • tuure "code":$5
wikibase-client-data-bridge-login-warnin: Fu san "logging" kɛ ba'asɛ, n beleni fu mɛ yu "tab" buna gee le lebe "tab" mɛnka ta le tiregɛ biŋere.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-reference-no: Yelesum demesego duma wan ta'am iŋɛ pa'asɛ n boi {{WBREPONAME}} fu san biŋe ba'asɛ
wikibase-client-data-bridge-thank-you-he: N pu'usɛ ya la fu demesego la!
wikibase-client-data-bridge-thank-you-ed: Fu ta'am demese yelesum n boi lɔgekuna puan n de {{WBREPONAME}} fu san kɔ'ɔm di'e "button" wa n boi tilum wa.
wikibase-client-data-bridge-saving-error: Fu ta'am "publish" fu teere fu san ka lɔɔgɛ kɛ. Fu "IP adɛresi la wan kaalɛ n boi fu demesego pɛgerɛ yɛla la puan. Fu ta'am kelum le lɔɔgɛ lebe pooren gee kelum le malum iŋɛ " publishing ".
